item.title: Debugging a Camera Brownout on Snapdragon X Elite — OV02C10 & the Passive Discharge Problem
item.description: The front camera on the Lenovo Yoga Slim 7x fails silently on rapid power cycling. The chip ID reads fine but streaming times out. Root cause: PMIC rails take 2.3s to discharge, leaving the sensor in a brownout zone.

item.title: Fixing Deep Sleep on Snapdragon X Elite — Three Wake Sources, Five Patches
item.description: The Yoga Slim 7x refuses to stay asleep. Charger GLINK interrupts, I2C HID dummy regulators, and keyboard LED drain — three independent wake sources across three subsystems, each one capable of breaking s2idle on its own.

item.title: DPU Encoder Wedge Detection & Kernel Panic Fix on Snapdragon X Elite
item.description: After long suspend with an external DP monitor, the DPU vblank state freezes. Disconnecting the monitor was triggering a kernel panic and data corruption. Here's how I detected the wedge and fixed the crash.
